website_summaries.verdict: At $199 sans contract, the ZTE Warp 4G is the best choice for frugal shoppers on Boost Mobile.
pros: Available for a low $199 off-contract, the ZTE Warp 4G delivers swift 4G speeds, and is equipped with a feature-packed camera
It also has long battery life, clean call quality, and solid construction
cons: The ZTE Warp 4G’s processor is slow, and its camera struggles under low light

customer_reviews.title: Worked for about a week and quit charging, and ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked for about a week and quit charging, and was unable to run the GPS after awhile. Returned it, and found many others had similar issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Seely

customer_reviews.title: Just bad buisness
customer_reviews.text: Not happy at all paid for express shipping it was not express waited for over a week to get the phone. Then when the phone arrived it had lines all down the screen and is in no way useable. Very unhappy now I have to return the pho b e and wait even longer. And this was a gift for my father.
customer_reviews.author: mary roberts

customer_reviews.title: Tech Problems
customer_reviews.text: Very good phone. Only issue is that I can't use a major function like making and receiving calls on the device unless I'm connected to the charger

customer_reviews.title: waste of my time dont plan on using amazon anymore

customer_reviews.title: One Star

customer_reviews.title: Good for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Fairly good phone for the price, I got it for my mother and she loves her games, after a year she has run out of memory space and there are limited items that she can transfer to the external memory card. Otherwise it is a good phone.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: ITS GREAT!!!...

customer_reviews.title: Best Phone I Ever Got Myself
customer_reviews.text: Iphone is way overrated... I stick to the Android team and got this at a very low price... I was happy with this phone. So much so that just last week I went ahead and ordered my daughter one of these instead of the iphone she wanted so badly (once I talked her out of it because I know myself how iphones are).. plus with Boostmobile service how can you go wrong? I win!!

customer_reviews.text: The signal is no good I drop calls all day. This is the 2nd boost phone I bought and same thing with both.

customer_reviews.text: Phone didn't work after I received it. It had a blue screen and wouldn't do what it was supposed to do. :( Sadly, I had to send it back.

customer_reviews.text: It work fine for 3 months then, screen just lights up and nothing more. Too late to return to replace item.

customer_reviews.text: This phone is very disappointing after a week of using screen mess up again 2nd phone I had got... I just believe this phone is no good

customer_reviews.title: The phone arrived barreling working. It was an unlocked ...
customer_reviews.text: The phone arrived barreling working. It was an unlocked phone that needed a Sim card which was not mentioned when I bought it. The screen was fuzzy and after a couple day all together stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: aubrey

customer_reviews.title: disregard ppl negative ratings
customer_reviews.text: This device is great for the ppl having issues with reboots its call change kernel my phone runs smooth like silk good things in the making
customer_reviews.author: Big daddy

customer_reviews.title: I hate this phone
customer_reviews.text: The phone crashes on me from time to time I wish I would have never gotten this phone but it's cool
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Why all the bad reviews??
customer_reviews.text: Wow, all these bad reviews.. honestly, I loved my phone! When I switched to boost about a year ago I asked the store which phone had the best camera and this was it, it's fast and works great! Well, it DID work great until I cracked the screen. The only complaints I have were that after a few months the calls were muffled to the person on the other end, that was pretty bad actually. And it can be glitchy and freeze sometimes, but that didn't happen until recently, and its nothing restarting it didn't fix. I'm actually considering buying the same phone to replace my broken one
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: Major no no
customer_reviews.text: Please don't waist money on this phone. I ordered two of them from boost mobile and in three months, the screens went black then the charger ports wore out. The sound quality is awesome. That is the only positive thing I can say about the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Shakira Kornegay

customer_reviews.title: Worst Customer Service Ever
customer_reviews.text: Bought this phone and less than four months later it starts acting glitchy and then does the multicolored pixelated screen. ZTE says that since its under warranty they will repair it in no less than 3 weeks! Who can do without their phone for three weeks? Plus this is a common defect for this phone and ZTE refuses to send me a loaner. Worst service and phone I've ever had. I would never recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ty Adalyn

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk it will die
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this phone and it died less than 6 months. I had to send it back to ZTE and had to wait 3 weeks till they could figure out what was wrong with the phone. Instead of just sending a new one out ( still under 1 year warranty) they had me wait till they looked at the phone and finally figured out that they needed a new mother board. Do not purchase this phone....I loved it at first but then found out you get what you paid for. Customer service for ZTE is awful and they do not care it you are being inconvenienced by not having a phone.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: don't do it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone a month ago. I wouldn't recommend this phone it crashes, contact picture is very small, the block list isn't a real block list you can see when call and text and front camera sucks! Then I had to reset phone five times and it deleted all my pictures! Also the camera doesn't work sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: tyesha

customer_reviews.title: zte boost warp
customer_reviews.text: i got this phone didnt even have it a yr n it crashes all the time n now it wont let me charge the phone will never buy a zte warp ever again
customer_reviews.author: whatsyourscent

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend this phone.
customer_reviews.text: This phone has a 1 year manufacture warranty. I tried to return my phone and under no circumstance would they repair or replace. This phone keeps crashing and the battery goes dead after it has a full battery. Why? I would not recommend this for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ericka

customer_reviews.title: They did a good job shiping and it was a good phone but ...
customer_reviews.text: They did a good job shiping and it was a good phone but boost doesn't have a sim cards any more and it makes the phone worthless I took a old Sim card and cut it down so it might work it doesn't say no Sim card any more other wise I need need my money back if doesn't work thank you Doug Kittell
customer_reviews.author: KITTELL

customer_reviews.title: BAD QUALITY PHONES
customer_reviews.text: Never ever buy a ZTE phone, no matter which model you get. They start off great and in less than 3 to 6 months you will have to return it and good luck getting a better replacement phone, it won't happen, they will just send you the same crappy model # back.
customer_reviews.author: Roxie

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I hated this phone. I bought it because I was in a pinch and it was in my price range. I bought it from radio shack for it believe $120. Worse purchase ever. It's always dropping classes, freezing, no sending/receiving messages, it will randomly shut off, and it's so slow.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: The battery is drained very quickly during things like google maps
customer_reviews.text: I have zero complaints about this phone. It is cheap, fast, and does everything I want it too. The battery is drained very quickly during things like google maps, but that's a problem with just about every smart phone. Besides that the battery life is quite good. The camera is fine, and works well in most environments. To put it simply, this phone will do everything you want a smart phone to do at a fraction of the price.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: This phone is a piece of garbage! Once you buy it you are stuck with ...
customer_reviews.text: This phone is a piece of garbage! Once you buy it you are stuck with it. Boost Mobile does nothing to attempt to repair it or offer refunds. The phone literally shut off and reboot all day. It takes forever to come back on afterwards, the screen is constantly freezing and you can forget it if you are trying to send or receive pictures. Please trust the poor reviews that are posted for this phone and quickly run for life from this one.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Jack

customer_reviews.title: ZTE WARP
customer_reviews.text: This phone is great . YOU CAN NOT beat it for the price. Android , 4G ,good battery life and a large rich display. I am very happy with this phone and it Serves me well running around in NYC.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Zzi

product_meta.title: ZTE Boost Warp 4G Black (Boost Mobile)
product_meta.description: The Boost ZTE Warp 4G Smartphone has all the basics that you need to keep you connected to your life while you are on the go. The Android 4.1 (Jelly Bean) operating system helps you run your apps and utilities smoothly. This prepaid smartphone hardware includes a 1.2GHz dual-core processor, a touchscreen display and an 8-megapixel rear-facing camera that allows you to capture the most important moments in your life with the high quality and stunning clarity that they deserve. *SIM Card not included

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.3 out of 5 stars63 ratings3.3 out of 5 stars
